attributes.action: make the met take a zero tolerance stance on cyclists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the met must take control of the rouge cyclists who abuse every road rule.
most of the riders in London ignore traffic lights and one way streets.
rickshaw riders are even worse as they abuse the law with the public riding in them.
cycle riders are not above the law most have no lights and they are a menace to the rest of the public.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
